amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to require the president to report to Congress on its policy related to human rights, nuclear proliferation, the ballistic missile program, and regional terrorism in Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 28, 1 Present (Roll no. 685).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 28, 1 Present (Roll no. 685).
